title: Why I Like The OnePlus 6
description: My review on the OnePlus 6 after using it for about a month. Solid device but very much a OnePlus device. I'd consider it the best $500 phone on the global market. Neon Green Tea -  Teal Glass Jar -   Background Music: Fili - Up Coast  If you want to support the channel, consider a Dave2D membership by clicking the Join button above!      Purchases made from store links may give me some money.  (It doesnt cost you extra, so please buy everything)
